attributes.action: Make Prescription Charges FREE for all UK Nationals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make Prescription Charges FREE for all UK Nationals not just Wales.
We all Pay National Insurance and this is just a Tax on being Ill.
A lot of people dont use their prescriptions due to cost of multiple items, prefering to fight it off themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
